announcement.title: ğŸ“± Smartphone v1.7.3.1 Update
announcement.content:
Smartphone Widget v1.7.3.1 is now available.

This update fixes sound settings and adds safeguards for simultaneous calls.


  • ğŸ“ Line Busy: Added a check for active calls. If you call someone who is already on the phone, you will now get a 'Busy' signal instead of errors.
  • ğŸ”Š Audio Fixes: Fixed issues where custom sounds (ringtones/dial tones) were not applying or updating correctly.
